kannada_original: ನಿನ್ನ ಮಿತ ಬಲದಿಂದ ಎಂತಾವ ನಿಯತಿ ಕೈ
english_transliteration: Ninna mita baladinda entāva niyati kai
english_translation: With your limited strength, what kind of destiny's hand
Will cause the lines to be written, shining like lightning?

kannada_original: ಕಾದು ಕುಳಿತಿರು ನೀನು ಆ ದಿನದ ಬರುವಿಕೆಗೆ ;
english_transliteration: Kādu kuḷitiru nīnu ā dinada baruvikege ;
english_translation: You wait patiently for the arrival of that day;
If God is pleased, is it light! – Muddu Rāma.
